channel.title: ruby on Keep It Simple
channel.description: Recent content in ruby on Keep It Simple

item.title: ruby
item.description: class Person attr_accessor :name, :age, :gender end puts和print的区别：puts自动将输出光标移动到下一行 Stored properties cannot be marked potentially unavailable with ‘@available’ 临时解决方案 #if compiler(<5.7) #endif 参考资料 does not contain bitcode. You must rebuild it with bitcode enabled (Xcode setting ENABLE_BITCODE), obtain an updated library from the vendor, or disable bitcode for this target 在设置中将Enable Bitcode设置为No即可“ error build: '/Users/xxx/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/xxx-fjdqujfoagssicejpisepgndqmsf/Build/Products/Debug-iphoneos/xxx/xxx.framework/xxx(xxx-dummy.o)' does not contain bitcode.

item.title: Ruby 基础
item.description: 最近做组件的源码和二进制切换时遇到一些问题，在查资料时发现了cocoapods-imy-bin这个插件，打算以这个插件为基础进行改造，写一个适合自己业务场景的插件。但之前未接触ruby和cocoapods插件开发，这篇文章是一点学习笔记，方
